name: NSUniqueIDSpecifier
desc: A specifier for an object in a collection (or container) by unique ID.

items.name: init(containerClassDescription: NSScriptClassDescription, containerSpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier?, key: String, uniqueID: Any)
items.desc: Returns an NSUniqueIDSpecifier object, initialized with the given arguments.

items.name: var uniqueID: Any
items.desc: Returns the ID encapsulated by the receiver.
